All Fives Domino
================

Simple version of a domino variant

![image](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/jhdata?style=flat-square)
![image](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=pytest&message=19+tests&color=success&style=flat-square)
![image](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=coverage&message=69%25&color=yellow&style=flat-square)

## Installing

Install the [PyPI Package](https://pypi.org/project/all-fives-domino/):

    pip install all-fives-domino
